lead_paragraph: Chad Dawson will surrender the World Boxing Council light-heavyweight title rather than face a title showdown with Adrian Diaconu of Romania, the W.B.C. announced. Each fighter is unbeaten. Dawson’s decision to vacate the crown came after representatives of the two fighters took part in a purse bid for promotion rights to the fight and Diaconu’s side won the bidding.
